URLSearchParams.summary: The URLSearchParams interface defines utility methods to work with the query string of a URL.

remarks.para: An object implementing URLSearchParams can directly be used in a structure to iterate over key/value pairs in the same order as they appear in the query string, for example the following two lines are equivalent:

-Polyfill of URLSearchParams in core-js
-The interface.
-Google Developers: Easy URL manipulation with URLSearchParams
